subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Carlos Moyà defeated top-seeded Richard Gasquet of France, 6-2, 6-4, to reach the final of the BCR Open Romania in Bucharest. He will play the defending champion Gilles Simon of France, who defeated eighth-seeded José Acasuso of Argentina, 4-6, 7-6 (4), 6-4. The sixth-seeded Moyà was more aggressive and appeared fresher than Gasquet despite winning a grueling three-set quarterfinal on Friday.
